Hygiene.Question: How do you estimate your loved one’s ability to get into and out of the shower? How do you estimate their ability to clean him or herself?

articles.blurb: Learn an expert caregiver’s do’s and don’ts to accomplish these essential tasks more easily while maintaining your loved one’s dignity.
articles.title: An Expert’s Guide to Grooming and Hygiene for the Elderly

articles.blurb: It is important to provide support and offer assistance with essential hygiene tasks. Follow this personal hygiene checklist for providing personal hygiene care for the elderly.
articles.title: Personal Hygiene Checklist for the Elderly

Hygiene.blurb: Personal hygiene often declines with age. This can be embarrassing for many seniors to talk about but it's very important as the bathroom is #1 place falls occur. Thankfully there are many options, both temporary as well as permanent, that can help with this activity around the home and help maintain independence.

products.blurb: Enhancing bathroom safety and instilling confidence for greater independence, these shower grab bars provide a strong safety accessory for the elderly.
products.title: Design By Intent - Shower Bar

products.blurb: The Roll On Lotion Applicator is a long-handle applicator designed to help users easily apply lotion to their back and other hard-to-reach areas.
products.title: Roll On Lotion Applicator

Managing Medications.Question: How do you estimate your loved one's ability to take medication on time at the correct dosage?

articles.blurb: Putting a simple system in place and taking care of the basics helps seniors avoid common medication mistakes like taking the wrong drug, missing doses, or taking more than prescribed.
articles.title: 10 Tips For Safe Medication Management For Seniors

Managing Medications.blurb: Taking medicine correctly is essential for treating health conditions and managing symptoms. It's easy for a mix up to occur but thankfully there are many systems and tips available for seniors who may need a little assistance.

products.blurb: An automatic dispenser could make it easier for someone caring for an older parent, for example, and give them one less thing to worry about.
products.title: Hero Pill Dispenser

Walking.Question: How do you estimate your loved one's ability to walk independently from one location to another?

articles.blurb: As an older adult, regular physical activity is one of the most important things you can do for your health. It can prevent many of the health problems that seem to come with age.
articles.title: How much physical activity do older adults need?

Walking.blurb: Losing the ability to walk around freely is a massive barrier to independence in many senior’s lives. Thankfully, performing some fast and simple exercise routines can massively reduce declining physical ability. Incorporating routines can be a fun and empowering activity for seniors looking to maintain their independence.

products.blurb: As the growing population of older adults is seeking to gain strength and vitality while warding off inactivity-related disease and cognitive decline—and you can help them achieve their goals. The ACE Senior Fitness Specialist Program will teach you how to safely and effectively help seniors maintain vibrancy through health and fitness.
products.title: Ace Senior Fitness Program
